DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomly assign , within gender , one four treatment condition : 1 ) buprenorphine counsel prison , referral continue treatment OTP upon release ; 2 ) buprenorphine counsel prison , referral continue treatment CHC upon release ; 3 ) counseling prison , referral buprenorphine counsel OTP upon release ; 4 ) counseling prison , referral buprenorphine counsel CHC upon release . Participants assess study entry 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 month follow release prison . Outcome measure include : treatment entry retention community , heroin use , cocaine use , HIV infection , HIV-risk behavior , criminal activity , employment .
